Summary: "Provides a NeMo NLP model that jointly performs intent classification and slot filling for dialogue utterances. It sets up data loaders, tokenization, continuous slot handling, loss aggregation, and computes classification metrics during training, validation, and inference."

Business intent: "To enable developers to build conversational agents that can automatically detect user intents and extract relevant slot values from spoken or typed inputs, facilitating accurate dialogue management and downstream task execution."

Keywords list: ["intent classification","slot filling","joint model","dialogue understanding","NeMo","PyTorch Lightning","token classification","continuous slot processing","training pipeline","validation metrics","inference","natural language processing","conversation AI"].
